actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to study the water resources needs of the Northern Mariana Islands.
subjects: Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to study the water resources needs of the Northern Mariana Islands for the purpose of providing plans for the development, utilization, and conservation of water and related land resources.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to study the water resources needs of the Northern Mariana Islands.
